SVGAttributePreserveAspectRatio.summary: The preserveAspectRatio attribute indicates how an element with a viewBox providing a given aspect ratio must fit into a viewport with a different aspect ratio.

remarks.para: Because the aspect ratio of an SVG image is defined by the 'viewBox' attribute, if this attribute isn't set, the preserveAspectRatio attribute has no effect (with one exception, the 'image' element, as described below).
